BuffData.DynamicTooltip: <titleLeft>Frost Armor</titleLeft><mainText>Damaging an enemy with an ability or basic attack grants @f1@ Armor and reduces movement-slowing effects on Sejuani by @f1@% for 2 seconds. If Sejuani already has Frost Armor its duration increases by 2 seconds.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
